articles.title: Yet Another Data Scientist
articles.contents:
LinkedIn | Medium

My definition of a Data Scientist:

A software developer specializing in data science
application.

And, yes, I’m a data scientist. :)
I use data to solve problems. For the past decade I’ve worked in
E-commerce, cyber security, and banking indsutry.
WHENEVER THERE IS DATA, THERE IS A WAY.
